Very nice material, soft and comfortable.  The sizing seems a little small to me and I am a small size. the Waist is  tight, If you want a looser fit, size up a size. Otherwise a very nice outfit.

The sizing seems to be slightly smaller ordered2xl, but generally I'd order L or XL. The material feels very heavy. I like the shirt has pockets as do the pants! I think either piece paired with something different could be dressed up or down. The material is kinda shiny.
This set is comfy to wear except the waist band is tight.  The fabric is soft and stretchy.  Hand pockets are nice.  Love the color.

The fabric is incredibly soft and comfortable, making it perfect for long days of travel or lounging at home. I love the stylish design that effortlessly combines comfort with a trendy look, ensuring I feel put together while on the go. The drawstring pants are a great touch, allowing for an adjustable fit that enhances the overall comfort.

I recently purchased the PINSPARK 2 Piece Set for Women, and it's a decent outfit overall. The fabric is soft and comfortable, making it suitable for casual wear or travel. The drawstring pants are adjustable, which is a nice feature. The long sleeve sweatshirt is cozy but very thin.  The set is great for lounging or quick errands. The style is simple and versatile. It's a good option if you're looking for something comfortable and easy to wear.

The image accurately represents the product.  Amazon has become my go-to for sweatsuits, and this one in navy blue hits all the marks. The fabric is soft and giving, making it perfect for both fall and winter. Often, sweatshirt sleeves are too short, and the shirt is midriff, but not with this one. I also like the straight-leg pants with pockets.  This product is definitely a go!
Did not care for fit on me. Pretty color and nice fabric though.

Very cute and comfortable 2 piece set. The material is very soft. It almost has a silky feel to the outside of the material and it feels wonderful. The only reason I gave it 4/5 stars is because the top is really short on me.  I am long wasted and I wish I would have sized up for length in the top. I normally wear a size 8/10 or Medium and I think a size Large would have been a better fit for me.

I bought this purple long-sleeve tracksuit, and the color looks quite fresh and comfortable. There are actually many colors to choose from. The fabric is soft and smooth, with good stretch and breathability, making it lightweight. It's suitable for daily wear or exercise. The pants are loose, with a drawstring waist. For me, the pants are slightly long, so I'll need to trim off an inch from the length.
Great fabric and perfect fit wish to get more  with a sale price

I like this set of pants and a sweatshirt. Very comfortable. Good for fall. True to size and color as picture. I am 5'2, 125 lbs, and I ordered a size that fits perfectly. It is a soft material. Highly recommended!

评论概述: Has All The Right Details, but Runs Short...
评论详情: First of all, let's talk about this beautiful color - it's described as "hot pink," but don't let that scare you for a Fall/Winter color. It's actually a lovely crimson/mauve and perfect for the upcoming season. The fabric is a structured poly/rayon/spandex blend with an athletic-wear look and feel. The pants are an adjustable drawstring closure. I ordered this in the size S and it is true to size. However, it runs short in the pants. I'm 5'6" for reference and these hit me above my ankles - not the look I go for with sneakers, ugh!! The lower mid-section to the waistline on the pants is too short and creates bunching. I have a long torso and this is typical when not enough give is provided for the length in this area. Overall, it's not my favorite look but the color is everything and if the fit can work for you, this is definitely quality and durable.

This two piece outfit fits and feels great, ordering it in the size I needed, I couldn't believe how comfortable it is when I first put it on and wore it.  I love that I can wear the set together or the pants with another shirt and vice versa. Also, a black outfit like this is always a handy wardrobe item, IMO. The set washed well and when I had to dry it completely (as my washer is broke and I go to a laundromat), I had no shrinkage or any other problems.
Love the chocolate brown color I’m 5’6 and the pants fits just right ❤️
The outfit is soft and comfortable. I will wear for lounging and sleeping when the weather is cooler.

评论概述: Soft, hand pockets on top & bottom.
评论详情: There are many particular reasons I like this specific 'tracksuit' so I'll just list them: *Cuffs on sleeves. *No cuffs at the ankle. *Straight leg pants. *Pintuck stitching on the front of the pants. *Decent hand pockets on pants. *Good handwarmer pockets on the top. *Crew neck collar. *Tie closure at the waist in addition to elastic waist. *It's satin soft on the inside. *Comfort with a spot of class. *Quality made These are the main reasons I'm really liking this set. This is the first set I've bought that I would wear in public. I know the price might seem a little steep but you get what you pay for and IMO this is worth the price. I ordered my regular size large and I couldn't ask for a better fit. For reference, I'm 5'4", 159 lbs today, and 29" inseam. Machine wash cold, I use a laundry bag. No bleach or clothes dryer. I'll hang mine but you can also lay flat to dry. I know I'm going to wear this a lot this Fall and for Winter I have this leggings to wear under the pants for extra warmth. I can hardly wait!
Comfy and fits perfectly.
The straight-leg pants are equally cozy and provide great mobility, making this set ideal for travel or lounging.
I like this set as it’s comfortable and warm without leaving you itching! The material is soft  , looking forward to fall and the colder weather to enjoy these!

This two-piece sweatsuit set is thick and comfortable. It fits true to size, and both pieces fit well. The fabric is soft and thick. I bought it in pink, and the color is very pretty. I can't wait until the weather gets colder so I can wear this set all the time.
love the purple color. The material is thick and soft perfect for a cool fall day. I like the pockets on the pants and the sweatshirt.

This outfit is silky soft inside and out-I’m always hot, and this material feels cool and doesn’t stick on the skin. I can’t wear outfits that have fleece-too hot!! But this is thicker-not flimsy and sheer-you can wear it out of the house and it doesn’t look like pajamas. It washes well and comes out of the dryer with absolutely no wrinkles. It fits true to size.

I finally found sweatpants that don’t need hemming. At 5’2”, it is a challenge to find petite pants. These sweatpants are the perfect length and require no adjustments. I wore them all day with my Birkenstocks, and they didn’t drag on the floor. Im 184 lbs and ordered an XL for my pear-shaped figure. The pants fit well, but the sweater is loose. I recommend sizing down for a fitted look. Overall, they are soft, well-made, and comfortable.

Material has a satiny feel. I really like the color. The material is the perfect weight for fall when the mornings are cooler but warms by afternoon. They pants are just a tiny bit long a fairly easy fix. Very well made outfit.
This set fit me perfectly and the fabric is soft and comfortable. It is the perfect outfit to wear while running errands.
